Instruction: Peel the pumpkin and cut it into cubes.
In a pot of boiling water, cook the pumpkin cubes until tender, about 15-20 minutes.
Drain the cooked pumpkin and return it to the pot.
Add butter, milk, salt, black pepper, and nutmeg to the pot.
Mash the pumpkin using a potato masher until smooth and creamy.
Serve hot as a comforting side dish.
